text:
首領に報告すれば『残念だねぇ』とたった一言。 怒りや動揺はそこになく、あるのは微かな苦笑と同情。 何が原因かわからず項垂れるこちらに対して告げられたのは『君は一途だから』とそれだけ。
「なんにせよ、いま探偵社との関係が悪化するのは困る。 三日で何とかしてほしいものだね」
trans:
When I reported to the boss, all I got was a single remark, "That's unfortunate." There was no anger or agitation, just a faint, bitter smile and a hint of sympathy. To me, left hanging without understanding the cause, the only thing he said was, "You are too devoted."
"In any case, it would be troublesome if our relationship with the detective agency worsened right now. I expect you to resolve this within three days."
